title: 玩家掉虚空就被NCP踢出去怎么办?
author: Famestring
txt_content:
玩家掉虚空就被NCP踢出去怎么办?
提示：you are sending too many packets

我的配置:
flyingfrequency:
      active: true
      seconds: 20
      packetspersecond: 60
      actions: cancel
      reduceredundant:
        active: true
        seconds: 3
        actions: cancel

replies.author: 游侠崔斯特
replies.txt_content: 掉虚空肯定会被误判的 要不就取消NCP防飞设置，要么就不要搞那么多虚空

replies.author: hujixiang
replies.txt_content: 可以加一个tplogin 掉虚空直接回到出生点
